page.title: 15CONFIRMATION
page.content: CONFIRMATION THIS YEAR WAS HELD IN BELLEEK ON THE 18TH OF MAY 1985.BISHOP DUFFY ADMINISTERED COMFIRMATION TO BELLEEK,GARRISON AND ROSCOR SCHOOL CHILDREN. BEFORE WE WENT INTO THE CHAPEL SOME CHILDREN GOT THEIR PHOTOGRAPHS TAKEN. THE BELLEEK CHOIR SANG AS THE BISHOP ENTERED .THE BISHOP TALKED TO US BEFORE WE WERE CONFIRMED AND SOME CHILDREN SAID PRAYERS FROM THE ALTAR.WHEN WE WERE BEING CONFIRMED WE HAD TO GO UP AND KNEEL BEFORE THE BISHOP WITH OUR SPONSORS STANDING BEHIND. WHEN THE CEREMONY WAS OVER WE ALL WENT OUTSIDE AND SOME GOT PHOTOGRAPHS TAKEN WITH THE BISHOP.SOME PEOPLE WENT HOME FOR THEIR DINNER BUT SOME WENT TO THE HOTEL FOR A MEAL.WE ALL WENT AWAY FOR THE DAY AND WE HAD A GREAT DAY.ALL THOSE CHILDREN WHO ARE LEAVING THE PRIMARY SCHOOL THIS YEAR WERE THOSE CONFIRMED
